name:
Monster Hunter™ 4 Ultimate
Special Demo
description:
Welcome to the world of Monster Hunter! Take your first steps to discovering Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate and its diverse universe. Get ready to gear up, track down and hunt the ferocious monsters that reign over the world!

- Venture alone or gather your friends to hunt in local or online multiplayer!

- Try all 14 different weapon classes, and find your weapon of choice

- Optional tutorials available for all to become a skilled hunter

Please note that from the 30/06/2016 onwards, the online functions for this title will no longer be accessible.
